title: NO2 dimerization - calculate value of K -calc

The dimerization of NO2(g) , an exothermic process, is represented by the equation above.

 

A 0.0688 mol sample of NO2(g) is placed in a rigid 1.00 L reaction vessel and allowed to reach equilibrium at a certain temperature. What is the value of Kc at this temperature if 0.0133 mol of N2O4(g) is present at equilibrium?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
